page.title: 05Dart's Farm, Mackney.
page.content:
{Dart's Farm} Dart's Farm is at Mackney which is a small hamlet near Brightwell It is a large farm and was visited by a group of Chinese visitors a few years ago. Mr Dart has been at the farm for 25 years and the farm has won lots of cups in shows for the cows. There are 240 cows and 4 bulls on the 2,000 acre farm. There are also 8,000 sheep and 2,000 pigs. A litter of pigs varies between 6-18 piglets. My father works for Mr Dart and helps look after the cows.He has won two cups himself. During the winter I go beating during Partridge shooting on the farm. I have to help chase the birds out of hedges for Mr Dart and Angus Dart to shoot.
Wayne Gilding (Age 11)
